```{r wranging_q2}


[data] <- [data] %>%
  group_by(brand) %>%
  mutate(likes_total = sum(like_coount),
         dislikes_total = sum(dislike_count),
         proportion_likes_total = likes_total / sum(likes_total, 
                                                    dislikes_total))
[data] <- [data] %>%
  group_by(brand) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(proportion_likes_yearly = like_count / sum(like_count,
                                                    dislike_count))

```

```{r q2_graph_1 }

ggplot([data], aes(x = brand, y = proportion_likes_total)) +
  geom_bar()

```
